claim_ens_page.title: Claim a unique Name
claim_ens_page.subtitle: Unique names can be assigned to your avatar for use as an alias, or they can be assigned to parcels.{br} Assigning a name to a parcel or estate allows you to create a unique URL, like {exampleLink}, making it easy to send people to your LAND. When someone follows your new URL, they will be redirected to your LAND in {dclWorldLink}{br} Names are only available in Ethereum, and can only be claimed with Ethereum MANA {symbol}

mobile_page.message: The Builder is only available on desktop right now. Sign up to receive updates and check it out on your computer.
mobile_page.reminder_body:
Hey there!

Whoops! It looks like you tried to use the Builder from a mobile device!
The Builder only runs on desktop and laptop computers. Grab your nearest computer, and try again at https://builder.decentraland.org

Happy building!

The Decentraland Team

migrate_page.step_one_message_line_one: In order to provide a seamless experience across our products, we have switched the Builder's account system from email to wallet based. This means that you will need to connect an Ethereum wallet to store your scenes in the Cloud. If you don't have a wallet you can learn more about how to get one {link}.
migrate_page.step_one_message_line_two: If you had Scenes stored in your email account, you can migrate them to your wallet account using this page.
migrate_page.step_two_message: Please login with your email account to find the Scenes that need to be migrated.
migrate_page.step_three_message: Please connect your wallet to continue. If you don't have a wallet here's a {link} to get one.
migrate_page.step_three_error: Please install {metamask} or other Ethereum wallet to continue
migrate_page.step_four_message: Migrate all Scenes and asset packs under your email account into your wallet account.
migrate_page.projects_title: The following Scenes will be migrated:

slide0.description: This is Decentraland’s new Scene builder. Before you get started, let us show you around.

title.length: Title length must be between {min} and {max} characters.

collections_page.empty_description: You have no Items or Collections yet. Create a new item or collection, and dress the metaverse in style!

curation_page.search_placeholder: Search between {count} {count, plural, one {result} other {results}} by name or owner address...
curation_page.empty_collections: There are no collections to review yet.

item_detail_page.notice: You need to add your items to a collection before you can publish them

collection_detail_page.set_on_sale_popup: This will allow your collection to be sold in the Decentraland Marketplace.
collection_detail_page.unset_on_sale_popup: This collection is on sale in the Decentraland Marketplace.
collection_detail_page.notice: Cool! Now you can start working on your items. {editor_link} to open the editor or click the edit button on any item.
collection_detail_page.start_adding_items: Looking good! Start adding items to your new collection
collection_detail_page.cant_remove: You will not be able to add or remove items after publishing your collection.
collection_detail_page.cant_mint: This collection is still under review, once that process ends you'll be able to mint items
collection_detail_page.cant_push: This collection is still under review, items can still be minted but will not reflect new changes until approval

collection_menu.not_posted: The collection wasn't posted to the forum. You can retry here

edit_price_and_beneficiary_modal.title: Set price and address for "{name}"
edit_price_and_beneficiary_modal.beneficiary_popup: This is the wallet address that will receive MANA when this item is sold. You can set a different beneficiary address for each item in a collection.

confirm_delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

publish_collection_modal.title: Publish Collection
publish_collection_modal.first_paragraph: You are about to publish your collection, keep in mind the following things:
publish_collection_modal.second_paragraph: You will not be able to add or delete items after you publish your collection.
publish_collection_modal.third_paragraph: You will be able to see your items in the marketplace but they will be available for sale once the collection is validated by the DAO.
publish_collection_modal.items_breakdown_title: You are about to publish {count} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}}. The MANA fee for each collection goes to the Decentraland DAO, where it is used to support the growth of the community through grants, events, and prizes.
publish_collection_modal.tos_title: I hereby represent and warrant that:
publish_collection_modal.tos_first_condition: 1: The submitted Wearable/s is in full compliance with the {terms_of_use} and {content_policy}, which I acknowledge and accept.
publish_collection_modal.tos_second_condition: 2: I have sufficient Intellectual Property Rights over the submitted Wearable/s.
publish_collection_modal.tos_third_condition: 3: I acknowledge that the DAO may refuse to mint the Wearable/s based on infringements to the Content Policy and Terms of Use. I also acknowledge that the proposal fee won’t be reimbursed in case of rejection.
publish_collection_modal.invalid_email: The given email is not valid.
publish_collection_modal.accept_by_publishing: By clicking Publish you are accepting our terms
publish_collection_modal.not_enogh_mana: You don't have enough {symbol} to publish this collection.
publish_collection_modal.get_mana: You can get more using the {link} dapp.

mint_items_modal.title: Mint Items
mint_items_modal.limit_reached: You can only mint {max} items per transaction
mint_items_modal.no_items: You have no items available to mint for "{name}"
mint_items_modal.unsynced_warning: Some items have changes that have not been approved yet.

sell_collection_modal.title: Do you want to sell your items?
sell_collection_modal.turn_on_description: By turning this switch on your collection will be available for purchase in the Decentraland Marketplace.
sell_collection_modal.turn_off_description: By turning this switch off your collection will not longer be available for purchase.
sell_collection_modal.unsynced_warning: Some items have changes that have not been approved yet.

manager.title: Collaborators
manager.subtitle: If you collaborated with other creators when making this collection, enter their ETH address

minter.title: Minters
minter.subtitle: Enter the ETH address you want to allow for minting your items

push_collection_changes_modal.title: Push Changes
push_collection_changes_modal.description: Changes have been made to the collection or the items contained by it since the last time a curator has reviewed them.{br}In order to have this changes reflected on the marketplace and in the game, they have to be reviewed and approved again by the committee.{br}Are you sure you want to push the changes for review?

collection_card.subtitle: Collection · {count} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}}

top_panel.go_to_forum: Please go to related forum discussion and let the creator know your decision.
top_panel.waiting_for_upload: Some items in the collection are still being uploaded to the Catalyst. Please check back soon to proceed with the curation.

reject_curation.title: Reject Changes

reject_curation.tx_pending: Waiting for reject changes transaction to confirm

left_panel.title: My Items
left_panel.invalid_representation_tooltip: This item doesn't have a {bodyShape} representation

center_panel.disabled_animation_dropdown: There needs to be at least one visible item in order to select an avatar animation

right_panel.replaces_info: When a user equips your item, any other items in the category you select will be unequipped. Users must reequip them after removing your item.
right_panel.hides_info: When a user equips your item, any other items in the category you select will stay equipped, but they won't be rendered. Users will only see their other items reappear after removing your item.
right_panel.request_for_changes_explanation: If you want to make changes to {name} please ask a committee member for authorization in the forum

maintainance.notice: We're currently under maintainance, we'll be back soon!

intro_popup.title: Introducing Polygon MANA
intro_popup.content: Polygon MANA will allow you to make transactions much faster and cheaper.{br}You can learn more about Polygon MANA in our {blog_link}, and don't forget you can start managing your coins in our new {account_link}.{br}Click your avatar, select {manage_account} and start conquering the Metaverse.

meta_transaction_failure.body: There was an error sending the meta transaction.{br}Please try again or join our {discord_link} to get support.

deploy_item_failure.body: Fail to upload the item "{itemName}" from "{collectionName}".{br}The item size is too big for the max size of {size}
